commit.message:
Update dependencies from https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/NuGet-NuGet.Client-Trusted build 5.9.0.7046

NuGet.Build.Tasks
 From Version 5.9.0-preview.3.7016 -> To Version 5.9.0-rc.7046

nodes.body: @Forgind I'm not sure what you mean. We did insert that build of NuGet into Visual Studio, so we also "flow" it though darc. Last week was crazy and we did many insertions (into VS), so I'm not sure build 5.9.0-rc.7046 is the latest one. I'll follow up on that, but when we do "add-build-to-channel" the right build number, msbuild's darc subscriptions will flow that though.
@zivkan, that answers my question—thanks! I was confused by the rebranding from nuget.client to nuget.client-trusted and wondered if something was up.

Ah, it's just that we started following dnceng's recommendation of building official builds from an internal ("trusted") mirror. Dnceng have a little work they need to do: https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/issues/6813  I guess this will "fix" the PR titles in the future. But yes, this was us.
